title: Failed to load URL "https://riot:cf6ee886bd0d5031@127.0.0.1:49669/index.html" with error "unknown er
body: I was playing today and suddenly my laptop ran into an error. It collected the error and restarted itself and when it came back i tried to open it but this link above kept coming out and wouldn't let me open. What should i do ?

replies.body:
Hey there,

Are you still experiencing this issue?

Have you tried [running a client repair](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes#wq6)?

Hey Guys, I found the solution in my case. It has nothing to do with the client or riot, this is caused by a spyware in your computer that changes your proxy server, what you want to do is open your > internet options, then click on the "Connections" tab > Then click on  "LAN Settings" and under "Proxy Server" uncheck the box that says "Use a proxy server for ......" 

This is the steps for Windows 10 and Windows 7, Windows 8 and 8.1 may vary.

Hopefully this work for you.
please be more clear on where you go to "internet options".

in case if you guys dont know what ALMANZAROX mean.
1. Go to start.
2. Search for Internet Option and open it
3. go top connections.
4. click on *LAN Settings*
5. uncheck the box that says "Use a proxy server for...."

PS: Mine was already unchecked, so i checked the box insted and it still worked.

Failed to load URL "https://riot:ADs7llurr85sJDYmTkIv0A@127.0.0.1:52434/index.html" with error "unknown error code - i play game and  now error riot pls help me  and fix it pls  {{sticker:zombie-nunu-tears}}

Hi the same thing happened to me when i tried to get on a couple seconds ago are you still experiencing the problem or did you fix it i dont know what it means at all and if you were able to fix it, please tell me how you were able too.
